alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 04 at 11:54AM MDT until November 04 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...ADDITIONAL WET SNOW ABOVE 3000 FEET... .Wet snowfall continues in central and northern Idaho especially above 3000 ft. Additional accumulations through early afternoon before transitioning to rain are expected. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 3000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wet snow expected Above 3000 feet. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Fernwood, Dobson Pass, Fourth Of July Pass, Osburn, Pinehurst, Mullan, Kellogg, Lookout Pass, Wallace, and St. Maries. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Heavy snow on trees may cause broken tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
